content: If Jesus Christ was the being which those mythologists tell us he was, and that he came into this world to suffer, which is a word they sometimes use instead of 'to die,' the only real suffering he could have endured would have been 'to live.'
translations: ita:Se Gesù Cristo è l'essere che i mitologi ci dicono che era e che è venuto in questo mondo per soffrire, che è una parola
